website_summaries.verdict: A reflective headband with extra protection from the sun and extra cooling technology.
pros: Can be worn with a hat
“Enduracool” technology helps you stay cool longer if you wet, wring, then “snap” the headband
Helps keep hair and sweat out of eyes
cons: Cooling technology only lasts half an hour to an hour for some disappointed reviewers

customer_reviews.title: It works great for 20 min then starts to get warm
customer_reviews.text: It works great for 20 min then starts to get warm. I work in a factory so I was constantly dipping it in cold ice water, didn't matter how I snapped it to activate it either. Still was warm after a short while.
customer_reviews.author: David Torres

customer_reviews.title: a nice headband. but i doesnt work for what i ...
customer_reviews.text: a nice headband. but i doesnt work for what i want it for. i followed all the instructions on how to make it stay cool. but its just wet and the short walk i take to go to work. doesnt stay cool for me
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great size though I do wish they were a little ...
customer_reviews.text: Great size though I do wish they were a little wider in the front. Still I like them and would purchase again. The fit was fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Basterson

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says its going to do
customer_reviews.text: Does what it says its going to do.....its keeps you cool. Bought for my 3 year old son who plays soccer in South Florida. Splash with ice cold water every 30 min or so, ring out, and hes good to go. Stays cool for a while. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Good to run with
customer_reviews.text: I run with this mostly in mild weather and chilly weather that's not cold enough for ear warmers/headband. I can't imagine it helping enough when it's 90+. It keeps my ears warm enough when i have it over them when it's 45-55 degrees so it just makes me assume it would wouldn't keep my head cool in hot weather.

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit skeptical but I live in a southern state where it's hot and arid. I run in the early mornings but it's still too hot, so I bought this to help keep me cool during intense outdoor activities. It really works, my forehead was actually cold after the first use. I can't speak to long term quality as I've only had mine a short time but so far I am very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: ShapelessCreature

customer_reviews.title: Just a bad sweatband?  Does it really cool?
customer_reviews.text: This thing is just a really weak sweatband if you ask me... it does nothing to get any cooler, or feel cooler... you can buy a cotton sweatband at a walmart or whatever, for probably a buck, dip it in cool water, "snap it" like they say, maybe squeeze some water out of it, slap it on your head, BOOM, same thing! Save ur money, don't buy
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great headband, keeps my head cool
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased severally Mission "cooling" products and have yet to be disappointed. The headband is very comfortable and does a great job of keeping my head cool on long hikes.
customer_reviews.author: PeacockBlue11

customer_reviews.title: Very nice running headband
customer_reviews.text: Does what its supposed to. Keeps my forehead cool on long, hot runs. Love it. When its dry, it slides a little, but the point of this is that its wet and when it is, it stays in place very well.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Not cooling at all
customer_reviews.text: Double layered so really soaks up sweat. This does NOT keep cool in hot temperatures whatsoever. To call this a cooling headband is misrepresentation. I just ran a team 100 mile in the Florida Keys and this did absolutely nothing to keep my forehead cool. Kept sweat out of eyes, but that was it
customer_reviews.author: sean edwards

customer_reviews.title: Good for running in the heat.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable headband. Keeps me a bit cooler during runs in the Florida heat. I can't say it significantly cools but it does help. I'm planning on buying another.
customer_reviews.author: FloridaRunner

customer_reviews.title: I don't cool off, so I was hoping for more of ...
customer_reviews.text: I felt it just kept the heat in my head, but then again, I don't cool off, so I was hoping for more of a cooling effect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is the perfect headband for when I mascot for my college
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect headband for when I mascot for my college. I am the mascot for my college and my hair gets in my eyes while doing it, you can't move it out of your eyes because your head is on and it's a huge struggle, after putting this headband on it helped keep the hair out of my eyes but it also kept my head and forehead cool after catching all the sweat I had secreted. Very pleased with this and have already been referring it to friends.
customer_reviews.author: clofrances

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says it will.
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased this headband for running in hot weather. This was my first 'cooling' product I purchased, so I honestly did not know what to expect from them. The headband does stay on, because there aren't many that I own that do. I washed it as instructed, soaked it in water, snapped it 3-6 times and it does stay cold through a run as well as a 60 min exercise class. "Mission" accomplished!
customer_reviews.author: LLS

customer_reviews.title: Winner!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! I'm a scalp sweater. If it is hot or humid or if I'm doing anything, sweat drips from my scalp. This thing soaks it all up! I was amazed, especially as thin and light as it is.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Harmon

customer_reviews.title: nice little head bad to keep cool
customer_reviews.text: nice little head bad to keep cool. got it for my wife who complains every time i make her go out in the sun. worked well when she kept up with it.
customer_reviews.author: rjbea52

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t really work like it says
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t stay cold, my kid likes it though just because it’s a headband lol
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable to wear and kept the sweat out of my ...
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable to wear and kept the sweat out of my eyes during my run. Would recommend to anyone that needs to keep the stinging irritation away during a run or high-intensity workout.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Love these headbands
customer_reviews.text: Love these headbands. Carry one in my purse in case it gets too hot. If I need it, I just wet it and pop it on. Instant cooling effect.
customer_reviews.author: Verabel

customer_reviews.title: Really keeps its cool!
customer_reviews.text: This little piece of cloth is amazing! It is keeping me cool in 95 degree weather while playing pickleball. I'm going to stock up! I wear it around my neck and pull it up like a headband when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Rockin Mom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Great wicking, doesn’t slip. I have othe products by Mission, all well made, all great products.
customer_reviews.author: Flo

customer_reviews.title: value for price
customer_reviews.text: It's a good product for the price but doesn't work as long as it did when I first purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer Jane

customer_reviews.title: It helps her stay cool during outdoor sports and the color is awesome
customer_reviews.text: MY daughter is 9 and this fits perfectly. It helps her stay cool during outdoor sports and the color is awesome
customer_reviews.author: Cincykid

customer_reviews.title: Bit narrow
customer_reviews.text: I usually like a fatter headband for my thick hair. But this does the job ok.
customer_reviews.author: Jljarmstrong

customer_reviews.title: Helps on super hot days
customer_reviews.text: It's not a miracle cure, but this definitely has helped in the dog days of August.
customer_reviews.author: Em Nukom

customer_reviews.title: Good looking, but doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Was disappointed with this product. It doesn't stay cool or wet for any length of time.
customer_reviews.author: daniel holmes

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: A cold wash cloth does a better job. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: beesblues

customer_reviews.title: One size fits none
customer_reviews.text: Not for men. Or women. Maybe will fit midgets, small babies, or smurfs. Wouldn't recommend for serious athletes. Way too small.
customer_reviews.author: AnneMarieJane

customer_reviews.title: got wrong item
customer_reviews.text: don't know how good it is because I got wrong item from them returned
customer_reviews.author: Terri Forsyth

customer_reviews.title: Good gift
customer_reviews.text: Perfect the wife wears it out doing yards work or relaxing in the pool
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work, did its job while playing fastpitch in 109 temps!
customer_reviews.author: Doberman STL

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it. He wears it under his ...
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it. He wears it under his football helmet.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa G.

customer_reviews.title: It really works!
customer_reviews.text: Gardening in hot weather is so much more comfortable with this headband. No more sweat streaming down my face or suntan lotion dripping into my eyes. Expect a bad hair day after it's removed, but no worse than without the headband when summer temperatures spike. It's very easy to rinse out, and it dries quickly for storage.
customer_reviews.author: ALH

customer_reviews.title: I like this Mission headband
customer_reviews.text: I like this Mission headband. Fits comfortable and is nice and thin. The actual cooling gimmick is minimal, but I like it even when it's lukewarm, I do feel overall cooler because I don't feel the sweat dripping off my forehead.
customer_reviews.author: DMBenG

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this band you don’t need a towel with it when working out
customer_reviews.author: Frances Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Perfect headband for sports, weightlifting, and even the factory life.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Stitt

customer_reviews.title: Good for workouts at the gym
customer_reviews.text: Great headband. Stays in place and absorbs the sweat. Easy to wash.
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: This product is just ok. The product instructions say you have to wet it, wring out the excess water and snap it a few times to activate it. After following the instructions to a 'T' I did not notice a difference between this product and wetting a regular headband. I would not buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: DeeLee

product_meta.title: Mission Enduracool Reflective Cooling Headband
product_meta.description: Enduracool technology instantly cools when soaked with water, is wrung out and snapped in the air creating a prolonged cooling effect. Reflective details keep you visible in low light conditions. The chemical-free cooling technology is resuable and machine washable. UPF 50 protection offers protection from the sun's harmful rays.
feature_bullets: Reflective details keep you visible in low light conditions
UPF 50 protection offers protection from the sun's harmful rays
When wet, stays cool for hours; when dry, soft and absorbent
